title: Dream Garden
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Thai, Western
description: Chinese name 梦幻花园, address 越秀区烟雨路38号南门广东美术馆江堤1楼自编A. Western style bar and restaurant. Some seats have view of the river. Offers afternoon tea and Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: 1-A, Jiangdi, Huangdong Museum of Art, 38 Yanyu Road, Yuexiu District
